item.title: Theater 1 restaurant 0
item.description:
Yo!

item.title: Proof That Even I Can Stick to a Routine
item.description:
Recently I have updated my morning routine to something that I'm proud of, so here I'm to boost it.
1. First thing (after all the essentials), I do a leetcode question every day. This takes me roughly around 45 mins. Yes I'm a bit above noob at this space. Why this habit? Recently I realized I'm b...
